Articles.Content: I don't know if this an idea but It might be cool to see kerbals with glasses, Moustaches and different type of hairstyles this can make the kerbals more alive.  As well as giving us away to design our own kerbals.
We have already seen evidence of kerbals with glasses, different hair styles in the different videos that have featured them. It's safe to say that the kerbals looks will be varied.

I think it would be great if after a crash a kerbal had a bandage on their head for some period of time.  And when around other Kerbals they'd point and laugh and he/she would laugh along with

Edited October 12, 2021 by darthgently
or each player has emotes they can use (not paid/all unlocked) for mutiplayer like thumbs up and pointing and luaghing or doing an a-ok gesture

13 hours ago, planeticegaming said:

or each player has emotes they can use (not paid/all unlocked) for mutiplayer like thumbs up and pointing and luaghing or doing an a-ok gesture

I mean, they showed that Kerbal dancing in the one show and tell video, so I think emotes of some kind are definitely coming.

On 10/12/2021 at 5:32 AM, planeticegaming said:

or each player has emotes they can use (not paid/all unlocked) for mutiplayer like thumbs up and pointing and luaghing or doing an a-ok gesture

Hmmm ,  I can see it now...

Bob gives Jeb the 'shaking bottle' gesture, Val laughs, and Jeb sulks and walks away.
